Item.method_code: ' name: ShowProjectInternals ' purpose: for debugging, shows the project internals in a raw database report ' useful for study and text file differencing. Dim callframe as Item = me.newitem("SQL","SQL PROCESS") callframe.setproperty("name","show_project_status") callframe.setproperty("PROCESS","CALL") callframe.setproperty("ARG1",me.getid()) dim resultframe as Item = callframe.apply() return(resultframe)
Item.name: ShowProjectInternals
